bill.title: Child Support Enforcement
bill.description: Includes tribal Title IV-D agencies and foreign countries as defined under federal regulations as authorized agencies that child support services and information can be provided to and received from. Effective July 1, 2011. (HB1005 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to HUS, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Monday, 01-31-11 9:00AM in House conference room 329.

(H) The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Jordan, Hanohano, C. Lee, Morikawa, Yamane, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Wooley, Ching.
(H) Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 48), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-10-11 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Luke, Morita, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes, Ito, McKelvey.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 299) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Coffman, Cullen, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Ward.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 217).
(S) Passed First Reading.

(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-31-11 9:45AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

(H) The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, B. Oshiro, Jordan, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla.
